description: Damian Taylor"The Decimator"Ht: 5'7" WT: 155lbs Season W/L record ( 0-2)Liam Harkmoore"Hardball"Ht: 5'8" WT: 135lbsSeason W/L record (1-0) Returning after winning his first match here on NK is Liam "Hardball" Harkmoore. After tasting sweet victory Hardball's ready for more, utilizing his past wrestling skills to his advantage. His opponent, Damian "The Decimator" Taylor has yet to score a win under his belt so in this redemption match, he plans on holding nothing back. The two take each other down hard as The Decimator goes for a face sit, shoving his balls in Hardball's face before he scrambles free. Hardball catches The Decimator in a nelson as pay back but gets caught in The Decimator's vicious scissor locks. When the points are announced, the winner has his way with his losing opponent. face fucking his mouth and riding the loser around like an animal before throwing him down on his back for a hard fuck.
title: Damian "The Decimator" Taylor vs Liam "Hardball" Harkmoore
